item.description:
Guys,

We planned this last year but couldn't do it due to bad weather. Lets try to do this this time.

International Motorcycle Show - NYC - Jan 21, 2012

The Jacob K. Javits Convention Center of New York 
655 West 34th Street
New York, NY 10001
Tel: 212 216-2000
www.javitscenter.com

We'll join the folks from Boston Tier 1 and will car pool to NYC. Anyone willing to drive, please RSVP with the number of passengers your car can hold. All we ask is that everyone chips in for expenses gas, parking, toll, etc).

The show tickets will be available for purchase online starting 10/10/11. The regular online price is $16 and if you use the code "SH2012", you get $4 off your ticket (Thanks Kim for sharing this info). There is also a group pricing available that we can leverage depending upon the headcount.

Route map

We'll spend couple hours at the show, after which we can venture out in the city, grab a bite, enjoy Times Square, etc...and later head back to Boston the same evening.

Please do not double RSVP on both Boston Tier 1 site and NESB site. RSVP only on 1 site so that its easier to keep track of headcount.

Hotel accommodation

If you are interested in staying overnight, then please make hotel reservations at any of the following hotels:

Comfort Inn Convention Center
442 W. 36th Street Manhattan, New York, NY, US, 10018

Travel Inn
515 West 42nd Street, New York, NY 10036, United States

The GEM hotel
449 W. 36th Street, New York, NY 10018, United States

Car Pool details

This will be updated as and when members confirm their attendance. Italic means the member is willing to offer a ride in their car.

Car A: Donald or Gary

Car B:

Car C:

Car D:

Car E:

Car F:
item.name: International Motorcycle Show - NYC - Jan 21, 2012
